abstract: Although emerging markets like Turkey, Indonesia and South Korea are making bullish headlines almost every day, The Financial Times reports that “just below the surface, lurks caution.”
snippet: Although emerging markets like Turkey, Indonesia and South Korea are making bullish headlines almost every day, The Financial Times reports that “just below the surface, lurks caution.”
lead_paragraph: Although emerging markets like Turkey, Indonesia and South Korea are making bullish headlines almost every day, The Financial Times reports that “just below the surface, lurks caution.”

headline.main: Investors Wary of Bullish Emerging Markets
